full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title: Mail Transportation Services for the Greater Montréal Area

#### Solicitation Information

- **Reference Number:** cb-26-85628340
- **Amendment Number:** 4
- **Solicitation Number:** 1000460960
- **Publication Date:** January 11, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 15, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** June 14, 2025

#### Procurement Details

The Canada Revenue Agency invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide mail transportation services for the Greater Montréal area. The contract period will be from the award date to June 14, 2025, with services commencing on June 15, 2024.

The resultant contract will contain four additional one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract period. Proposals must comply with the requirements of the solicitation document and meet all mandatory criteria to be considered responsive.

#### Selection Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated using the Lowest Priced Responsive Proposal selection methodology. The proposed services must be delivered in English or French.

#### Conditional Set-Aside Under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business

This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. To be eligible, the bidder must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business as defined under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and will comply with all requirements of the strategy.

#### Contact Information

For questions and proposal submissions, please contact:
Henrik Schwerdtfeger
Email: Henrik.Schwerdtfeger@cra-arc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 608-6997

Proposals must be submitted using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation.

#### Security Requirements

This requirement is subject to specific security requirements, which can be found in the solicitation document. The Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) apply to this procurement.

#### Bidder's Obligations

By submitting a proposal, the bidder acknowledges that they have reviewed and understood the solicitation requirements and will comply with all terms and conditions.

#### Excluded Trade Agreements

This procurement is not subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
- Canada
